meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lou Kaluza Hank Peddicord Isaac Braddock Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #816.

td.p: Lou Kaluza, a teacher from San Antonio, Texas
Hank Peddicord, a claims representative from Victorville, California
Isaac Braddock, a lawyer from Los Angeles, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,597)

tr.td: SHIPS
NURSERY RHYMES
ELVIS
ADJECTIVES
HISTORY
HOW TO...
